on reading compounds: 仄声【ソクセイ】the three tones of Chinese that exclude the high-level, or first, tone
仄聞【ソクブン】hearing casually, hearing by chance, learning by hearsay
kun reading compounds: 仄か【ほのか】faint, indistinct, dim, few, a little
仄めかす【ほのめかす】to hint at, to intimate, to suggest, to allude to, to imply
仄めく【ほのめく】to be seen dimly, to glimmer
